altername_name: 太鼓の達人Wii ドドーンと2代目!
name: Taiko no Tatsujin Wii: Dodoon to 2 Daime!
overview: The second Wii version of the "Taiko no Tatsujin" series, which plays taiko in rhythm. All songs from the previous work "Taiko no Tatsujin Wii" have been renewed! "Tales of Versus" theme song "Be your wings", "Dragon Quest IX" "Overture IX", "Idol Master" series "" HELLO " You can enjoy the latest 70 popular songs such as "!!". In addition, "Boss Battle" has appeared as a new element. Let's defeat the boss by playing a song while avoiding the interference of enemies such as mixing Bakudan notes in the score or hiding the score! Also, "Hakase's Institute" where you can explain how to play and change the costume of the character , "More! Everyday Challenge Dojo" where you can challenge various themes and practice rhythm, and so on.
